text: Saint John of the Cross (original name of Juan de Yepes y √Ålvarez)(1542-1591) was a Spanish Catholic mystic. He belonged to the Carmelite order. He is one of the Doctors of the Church. And He is a patron saint of mystics and contemplatives and of Spanish poets. ==Other websites== * Link to St John quotes Category:1542 births Category:1591 deaths Category:Christian mystics Category:Spanish Roman Catholics
title: John of the Cross
